title: Support main LF ADC Duo buddies
body:
I am climbing through my first season in ranked.

Currently in S5, I am level 125 and have been playing for years but this is my first year playing ranked. I keep getting stuck with second pick  adc's or people that just aren't very good or don't play well with me in the role. Occasionally i get some decent players and we game together for the night but then never seem to be online at the same time again after that. 

I am looking for _**ADC Mains**_ to duo with. I am a **Tahm/Leo** main sometimes i will play **blitz/cho/pyke** depending on the team comp we are facing.
I am generally on most nights between **7.30pm  to 12am** AWST (Perth)

Summoner name is **J0NESY** (the O is a Zero). Send me an Add and let me know who you are.
